quote:
You remember too much, my mother said to me recently. 
Why hold onto all that? And I said, where can I put it down?
author: Anne Carson

quote: If you have endured a great despair, then, you did it alone.
author: Anne Sexton

quote: How can I begin anything new with all of yesterday in me?
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: I clawed my way into the light but the light is just as scary. I’d rather quit. I’d rather be sad. It’s too much work.
author: Richard Siken
